price: Ntizizashobora kubatabara, ahubwo zizazanwa ari ingabo zo kubarwanya.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā yastaṭīʿūna naṣrahum wahum lahum jundun muḥ'ḍarūna
